text: It ’ s a boy for Are You The One? couple Gianna Hammer and Hayden Weaver! The couple, who met on Season 5 of the hit MTV dating show, announced the birth of their son via a series of Instagram posts on Saturday. Gianna and Hayden named their son August. “ 24 hours of labor ending with a c section … only for you, August, ” Gianna wrote in the caption of an Instagram photo of her holding her new baby. In his own Instagram post, Hayden discussed the difficulty Gianna had bringing August into the world. “ We were awake for 36 hours before you made mommy get a C section, but meeting you was still the single greatest moment of our lives, Little August, ” Hayden captioned a picture of the newborn. “
